comments.body: You shouldn't be creating a boto3 client directly; use the boto3_conn() function as it is done above so that it's all consistent.  In some cases ansible logic for finding the connection information may be different from standard AWS logic (e.g. where connection information parameters are passed direct to the module) so doing this might lead to inconsistency.
I was following the style of the other tests. It should be all changed at once in a separate PR. What do you think?
